page.title: 19MELBOURNE'S DIALECT
page.content: MELBOURNE HAS A STRANGE DIALECT ALL OF ITS OWN.HERE ARE SOME OF THE MOST FAMILIAR WORDS:- CROODLIN'-CROUCHING DOWN OKEY MAN_ICE CREAM MAN BOD_BIRD.OAT_ANYTHING.THRAY_THREE. COALAS_COALHOUSE.AY UP_HELLO. TWITCHELL_ALLEYWAY.GOBBLE_TALK. BALCHED_HAIR CROPPED SHORT.DOTTY_DIRTY SHOT_SHIRT.WESHAS_WASHHOUSE.SHIP_SHEEP WAITA_WATER.PALINGS_POTATO PEELINGS. WUNNA WOK_WILL NOT WORK.OS_HORSE. MOUNTEBANKIN'_CLIMBING ONTO THINGS. QUEEBLIN'_ROCKING ON A CHAIR. CAUSEY_PAVEMANT.ODE_OLD.OS_HORSE. SUMMERT'S CRACKED OFF_SOMETHING HAS HAPPENED. GE IT SUM WELLIE_PUT SOME EFFORT INTO IT. ER NAILED ON ER NEEL AN ATTA SEE A NOSS_SHE KNEELED ON A NAIL AND HAD TO SEE A NURSE. IT SEEMS A GREAT SHAME THAT SUCH A COLOURFUL DIALECT IS BEING LOST.
